characters.story: The field stands for abbreviation, shouting "Lyueh!" sharply!
See how the sun forms dizzy? It sings "Yoon!" cheerfully as sunlight streams across the sky!
The water takes the shape of muddled, asking "Hwun? Batter?" curiously!
"Gao!" The Eiffel tower of flesh sang cheerfully - ointment, salve or cream!
"Hung!" High lid sang cheerfully - to go smoothly, prosperous and unobstructed!
Like a mouth, this character means hum and sings "Hung!" spoken through parted lips!
The water stands for honest, asking "Chwun? Sincere?" curiously!
A striking symbol for whale that sings "Jing!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
